name: Paint Café
description:
You are a humble paint mixing robot, and it is your job to ensure each customer recieves the right colour.  However, you can only carry one of the primary colours at once, so you must dash around the stage to fufill orders.

Made in 1 week for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 159, with the theme  Café.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to Move.
  • SPACE or ENTER to Interact.
